ISSUE.TITLE: Incorrectly uppercase text with css
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Incorrectly uppercase text with css. By default uses english lang. Turkish letter "i" is creating a problem. e.g. "ılık" to css uppercase "ILIK" "ilik" to css uppercase "ILIK" When two different words are converted to uppercase, it means a single word. Can a similar development? <html lang="@(this.WorkingLanguage.UniqueSeoCode)" > or <html lang="@(this.ShouldUseOtherLanguageAttribute())" >
